testcase.name: Login with unauthorized user
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage...................................................passed When user enter invalid username "amit" and password "123456"...............passed And User click on Submit button.............................................passed Then validation message appears.............................................passed

testcase.name: Login with authorized user
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage...................................................passed When user enter valid username "admin" and password "Admin@123".............passed Then user click on catalog..................................................passed And user click on Sales.....................................................passed And user click on Returns...................................................passed When user type customer name................................................passed And Click on Filter button result is displayed..............................passed Then user clicks on logout..................................................passed
